#define SZ(X) (int)(X).size()
#define ALL(X) (X).begin(),(X).end()
#define ALLR(X) (X).rbegin(),(X).rend()
typedef vector<int>vec ;


const double EPS = 1e-6;
const int INF = 1<<28;
const long long INFL = 1LL<<62;
///************************

int main()
{
int T;
cin>>T;
while (T--)
{

  string s;
  cin>>s;
  int m;
  cin>>m;
  int sum=0;
  int res=0;
  for(int i=0 ; i<(int)SZ(s) ; i++)
  {
          if(i<m)
          {
            if(s[i]=='B') sum++;
            if(i==m-1) res=sum;
          }

          else
          {
                  if(s[i]=='B') sum++;
                  if(s[i-m]=='B')sum--;

                  /// check
                  res=min(res , sum);

          }
  }
  cout<<res<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
